descriptionHtml:
Name: Morannon
Category: Companions
Version: 1.0
Date: 2012/07/01


ADULT CONTENT! 

------------------- [This is what? ] -----------------------

Now here is the last of the companions made upon presets of some chars I had made before.
A mysterious and bright magicka girl Morannon.
She is of Nord race but I tried to make her look like Elf (or maybe half-blood Human-Elf)
Class: Combat Mage Destruction and Necromancer
Specialization: Necromancy and Ice Spells
Level: Calculated from 10 to 60.
Marriable
Essential
Initial Weapon: Magelight Staff 
Initial Armor: Nothing 
Morannon is naked when you meet her. You should choose outfit or armor for her yourself.

------------------- [Location] ----------------------


Where can Dovakin meet such kind of girl? She is waiting for you in Dead Mans Respite near Morphal


------------------- [Install] -----------------------
Copy and overwrite in Skyrim DATA folder 
NMM is recommended.
Put the checkmark at the SNMorannon.esp in your launcher or NMM 

Just delete the esp.file to uninstall the mod

------------------- [Requirements] -----------------------

IMPORTANT! YOU MUST HAVE APACHI SKYHAIR V1.3 AT LEAST!

Other mods you need for proper appearance

Better Females by Bella http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
The Eyes Of Beauty http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13722
RANs Eyebrow Replacer http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5812
RANs Eyeliner Replacer http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5701
UNP Female Body http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709
or Calientes Female Body Replacer of course http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666
VAnilla Skin Texture v1-8 http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554

All cheers and credits go to the modders whose mods I`ve used
Thanks  Bethesda for a great game


----------------------[Bugs]--------------------------------
The color contrast between face and body is possible. 





------------------- [Licensing / Legal] -------------
You are welcome to modify or reuse,  just give me credit.



Enjoy!
Sandraniks
author: Sandraniks
